title: Elizabeth I's Women - Tracy Borman (2010 - epub/mobi)
description:
Tracy Borman, "Elizabeth's Women: Friends, Rivals, and Foes Who Shaped the Virgin Queen"
Publisher: Bantam | ISBN: 055380698X | 2010 | EPUB/MOBI | 496 pages | 6 MB/6 MB

A source of endless fascination and speculation, the subject of countless biographies, novels, and films, Elizabeth I is now considered from a thrilling new angle by the brilliant young historian Tracy Borman.
